meanings.definition: Small sap-sucking insects that feed on plants.
meanings.sent1: The gardener sprayed the plants to get rid of the aphids.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use ladybugs to control aphids in their fields.
meanings.sent3: Why did the aphids throw a party on the rose bush?
meanings.sent4: The aphids multiplied on the leaves like a tiny army invading.
meanings.sent5: The aphids clustered on the stem, draining the life out of the plant.

meanings.definition: A type of pest that can damage crops.
meanings.sent1: The farmer was worried about the aphids infesting his cornfield.
meanings.sent2: Aphids can destroy entire fields of crops if left unchecked.
meanings.sent3: The aphids held a tiny protest against the farmer's pesticide.
meanings.sent4: The aphids spread through the field like a plague of destruction.
meanings.sent5: The aphids feasted on the crops, leaving devastation in their wake.

meanings.definition: Insects that reproduce rapidly and can cause plant diseases.
meanings.sent1: The aphids multiplied quickly, threatening the health of the garden.
meanings.sent2: Aphids can spread plant diseases as they feed on the leaves.
meanings.sent3: The aphids organized a race to see who could reproduce the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The aphids swarmed the plants, spreading illness like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The aphids reproduced at an alarming rate, overwhelming the garden with their numbers.
